item.title: Anton add a quote by Upton Sinclair
item.description: "It is difficult to get a man to understand something, when his salary depends on his not understanding it." -- Upton Sinclair

item.title: Anton add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Anton add a quote by Daniel Keys Moran
item.description: "Never test for an error condition you don't know how to handle." -- Daniel Keys Moran

item.title: Anton add a quote by Richard Bandler
item.description: "The greatest personal limitation is to be found not in the things you want to do and can't, but in the things you've never considered doing." -- Richard Bandler

item.title: Anton add a quote by Richard Bandler
item.description: "If you can't enjoy what you have, you can't enjoy more of it." -- Richard Bandler

item.title: Anton add a quote by William Gibson
item.description: "We have no idea, now, of who or what the inhabitants of our future might be. In that sense, we have no future. Not in the sense that our grandparents had a future, or thought they did. Fully imagined cultural futures were the luxury of another day, one in which 'now' was of some greater duration. For us, of course, things can change so abruptly, so violently, so profoundly, that futures like our grandparents' have insufficient 'now' to stand on. We have no future because our present is too volatile. ... We have only risk management. The spinning of the given moment's scenarios. Pattern recognition" -- William Gibson

item.title: Anton add a quote by William Gibson
item.description: "We have no future because our present is too volatile. We have only risk management. The spinning of the given moment's scenarios. Pattern recognition." -- William Gibson

item.title: Anton add a quote by William Gibson

item.title: Anton add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein
